# Jon Gerton's Web Development Services

This website offers professional web development services, primarily focusing on creating fast, mobile-friendly WordPress sites and custom web applications for businesses. Aimed at local businesses and those seeking quick, effective online solutions, the site emphasizes transparency, fixed pricing, and a straightforward process to help clients get their online presence up and running quickly.

## About My Work

This page outlines the process used to build websites, broken down into four clear steps:
1. **Discovery Call**: A brief chat to understand the client's goals and needs for their website.
2. **Content & Design**: Construction of the site using the client's content, with one round of revisions available.
3. **Launch**: Deployment of the site within five business days, handling all technical details.
4. **Ongoing Support**: Includes 30 days of post-launch support.

Key highlights include:
- **No Jargon**: Explanations in plain, understandable language.
- **Fixed Pricing**: Transparent cost expectations with no hidden fees.
- **Real Experience**: Over 27 years in tech and extensive web development experience.

### Links
- [Get Your Business Online](/services)
- [View My Work](/projects)

## Contact

This page serves as a point of communication for potential clients to discuss their projects, whether for WordPress sites or custom web applications. Users can send a message detailing their project or schedule a free 15-minute discovery call.

Additional contact methods include:
- Email: [jon@jpgerton.com](mailto:jon@jpgerton.com)
- GitHub: [@jgerton](https://github.com/jgerton)
- LinkedIn: [Jon Gerton](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

## Services

This section gives an overview of available services, including:
- **$500 WordPress Sites**: Fast delivery (within 5 business days) tailored for local businesses, featuring mobile-responsive design, basic SEO, and 30 days of support post-launch.
- **Custom Web Applications**: Solutions for unique business needs, built with modern technologies, with pricing provided upon request.
- **Team Growth Mentoring**: Mentorship and guidance for development teams at flexible engagement levels.

Every WordPress site includes a mobile-responsive design, basic SEO, contact forms, and content training for easy updates.

### Links
- [View Pricing & Details](/services)

## FAQ

This section addresses common questions, including the timeline for building a WordPress site, what's included in the package, hosting requirements, updating websites afterward, and service availability for clients outside of Alaska.

## Thank You for Contacting

This page confirms receipt of a contact message, outlining the next steps in the communication process, which includes project review and potential discussion on the details.
